items.name: H1. Tempura Udon
items.description: Noodle w/ broth, tofu, vegs, side of shrimp, and veg tempura.

items.name: H2. Nabeyaki Udon
items.description: Noodle w/ broth, tofu, vegs, chicken, and shrimp.

items.name: H3. Udon / Soba / Sukiyaki
items.description: Noodle with vegs, tofu, and broth. Add chicken, beef, shrimp ($3, $4, $5).

items.name: H4. Yosenabe
items.description: Noodle with seafood, vegs, tofu, and broth.

items.name: H5. Crispy Duck
items.description: Noodle with duck, veg, and broth.

items.name: H6. Fish Ball
items.description: Noodle with fish ball, vegs, and broth.
